summary.span: 表示用於 XML 加密的 項目。

span.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``加密文件 XML 簽章由 XML 加密規格所定義的項目。The class represents the `` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification. 類別包含的參考並由包含在另一個金鑰所加密的項目項目。The class contains references to and elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another element. 類別會使用項目參考項目，以及項目參考項目。The class uses elements to reference elements, and elements to reference elements. 您可以只新增或是物件至集合。You can add only or objects to the collection. 如需有關 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 加密語法和處理 1.1 版](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information about XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/).
